short-description: A working-class family man, Christopher Robin, encounters his childhood friend Winnie-the-Pooh, who helps him to rediscover the joys of life.
title: Jean-Christophe & Winnie

short-description: A married father of three tries to maintain his manliness in a world increasingly dominated by women.
title: Last Man Standing

short-description: The medieval misadventures of a hard-drinking princess, her feisty elf, and her personal demon.
title: Désenchantée

short-description: The absurd antics of an Indiana town's public officials as they pursue sundry projects to make their city a better place.
title: Parks and Recreation

short-description: Five high school students meet in Saturday detention and discover how they have a lot more in common than they thought.
title: Breakfast Club

short-description: A high school student is forced to confront her secret crush at a kissing booth.
title: The Kissing Booth

short-description: Five years after the events of
title: Mamma Mia! Here We Go Again

short-description: Emet, the perfect mom, boss, wife, friend and daughter, is learning to be okay with being imperfect.
title: I Feel Bad

short-description: Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. Special Agent Seeley Booth build a team to investigate murders. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones.
title: Bones

short-description: A mother personally challenges the local authorities to solve her daughter's murder when they fail to catch the culprit.
title: 3 Billboards: Les panneaux de la vengeance

short-description: A dramedy centering around the relationship between a thirtysomething single mother and her teen daughter living in Stars Hollow, Connecticut.
title: Gilmore Girls

short-description: A grumpy Grinch plots to ruin Christmas for the village of Whoville.
title: Le Grinch

short-description: A hedonistic jingle writer's free-wheeling life comes to an abrupt halt when his brother and 10-year-old nephew move into his beach-front house.
title: Mon oncle Charlie

short-description: Four teenagers are sucked into a magical video game, and the only way they can escape is to work together to finish the game.
title: Jumanji: Bienvenue dans la jungle

short-description: Plot unknown.
title: Spider-Man: Far From Home

short-description: Bob Belcher, along with his wife and 3 children, try to run their last hope of holding the family together, which is running Bob's dream restaurant.
title: Bob's Burgers

short-description: A private investigator in Los Angeles reluctantly teams up with a former star of a hit cop show.
title: Take Two

short-description: After a bad break-up, Jess, an offbeat young woman, moves into an apartment loft with three single men. Although they find her behavior very unusual, the men support her - most of the time.
title: New Girl

short-description: A look at the personal and professional lives of a group of women who perform for a wrestling organization in Los Angeles during the 1980s.
title: GLOW

short-description: In a wacky Rhode Island town, a dysfunctional family strive to cope with everyday life as they are thrown from one crazy scenario to another.
title: Les Griffin

short-description: Based on the true story of Forrest Tucker and his audacious escape from San Quentin at the age of 70 to an unprecedented string of heists that confounded authorities and enchanted the public.
title: The Old Man & the Gun

short-description: The satiric adventures of a working-class family in the misfit city of Springfield.
title: Les Simpson

short-description: A fast-talking mercenary with a morbid sense of humor is subjected to a rogue experiment that leaves him with accelerated healing powers and a quest for revenge.
title: Deadpool

short-description: The story of two miserable and unpleasant wedding guests, Lindsay and Frank, who develop a mutual affection despite themselves.
title: Destination Wedding

short-description: A comedy revolving around a group of teenage friends, their mishaps, and their coming of age, set in 1970s Wisconsin.
title: 70s show

short-description: A young couple must navigate a blossoming romance, amidst a war between their families' competing pizza restaurants.
title: Little Italy

short-description: Aspiring musician Miguel, confronted with his family's ancestral ban on music, enters the Land of the Dead to find his great-great-grandfather, a legendary singer.
title: Coco

short-description: Animated series about bad cops. Not bad as in corrupt, bad as in under-performing. They aren't first responders, they are the worst responders.
title: Paradise Police

short-description: Laurel and Hardy, the world's most famous comedy duo, attempt to reignite their film careers as they embark on what becomes their swan song - a grueling theatre tour of post-war Britain.
title: Stan & Ollie

short-description: A group of troublemakers are forced to attend night school in hope that they'll pass the GED exam to finish high school.
title: Night School

short-description: A young, devout Catholic woman discovers that she was accidentally artificially inseminated.
title: Jane the Virgin

short-description: Four lifelong friends have their lives forever changed after reading 50 Shades of Grey in their monthly book club.
title: Book Club

short-description: The continuing misadventures of neurotic New York City stand-up comedian Jerry Seinfeld and his equally neurotic New York City friends.
title: Seinfeld

short-description: A group of intergalactic criminals are forced to work together to stop a fanatical warrior from taking control of the universe.
title: Les gardiens de la galaxie

short-description: Follows the story of two trail bosses on the Oregon Trail and a woman on the wagon train who needs the help of one of them and who might be a marriage prospect for the other.
title: La ballade de Buster Scruggs

short-description: A 12-year-old boy and his best friend, wise 28-year-old dog with magical powers, go on a series of surreal adventures with each other.
title: Adventure Time avec Finn et Jake

short-description: The Guardians must fight to keep their newfound family together as they unravel the mystery of Peter Quill's true parentage.
title: Les gardiens de la galaxie Vol. 2

short-description: A working-class Italian-American bouncer becomes the driver of an African-American classical pianist on a tour of venues through the 1960s American South.
title: Green Book

short-description: A suspended lawyer is forced to enroll in a community college with an eclectic staff and student body.
title: Community

short-description: A group of friends become motivated to living fuller lives after the unexpected death of a close friend.
title: A Million Little Things

short-description: Follows Stevie, a thirteen-year-old in 90s-era LA who spends his summer navigating between his troubled home life and a group of new friends that he meets at a Motor Avenue skate shop.
title: Mid90s

short-description: Violet Jones tired of waiting for her longtime boyfriend to propose, breaks up with him. But old feelings, and heaps of jealousy, no doubt, arise when he promptly begins dating another woman.
title: Une femme de tête

short-description: Follows the awkward experiences and racy tribulations of a modern-day African-American woman.
title: Insecure

short-description: The Bandit is hired on to run a tractor trailer full of beer over state lines, in hot pursuit by a pesky sheriff.
title: Cours après moi shérif

short-description: Level-headed son Michael Bluth takes over family affairs after his father is imprisoned. But the rest of his spoiled, dysfunctional family are making his job unbearable.
title: Arrested development - Les nouveaux pauvres

short-description: In order to save their home from foreclosure, a group of misfits set out to find a pirate's ancient valuable treasure.
title: Les goonies

short-description: Devoted lifeguard Mitch Buchannon butts heads with a brash new recruit, as they uncover a criminal plot that threatens the future of the bay.
title: Baywatch: Alerte à Malibu

short-description: A group of friends who meet regularly for game nights find themselves entangled in a real-life mystery when the shady brother of one of them is seemingly kidnapped by dangerous gangsters.
title: Game Night

short-description: Follows a group of police officers on the front line wondering what they did to end up where they are now, on the ugly side of Manchester.
title: No Offence

short-description: Four female New Yorkers gossip about their sex lives (or lack thereof) and find new ways to deal with being a woman in the 1990s.
title: Sex and the City
